title.rendered: Fall 2021 Back to School Roadmap Webinar

content.rendered:
This fall, Handshake is focused on initiatives that increase student access to opportunity, facilitate relationships, and build career equity. Watch the recording below for a discussion of recently released products and features your team can leverage this back to school season, plus an overview of our product roadmap for the coming months.

Below are additional resources we shared during the session:

  • Virtual Appointments setup guide
  • Handshake Academy: Virtual appointments training course
  • Alumni Hub help article
  • Reimagining the Employer Trust Score—encore webinar
  • Virtual Office Hours for Career Services
  • Virtual Office Hours for Core Employers
  • Virtual Office Hours for Premium Employers
  • Virtual Engagement Kit
  • Spring 2021 Virtual Fair Benchmark Report

excerpt.rendered: Watch our fall 2021 roadmap webinar where we discuss initiatives that increase access, facilitate relationships, and build career equity.
